<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Starlit Eyes](/Feats.aspx?ID=2856) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 44 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Arcane Cascade](/Actions.aspx?ID=756), [starlit span hybrid study](/HybridStudies.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

Starlight shines in your sight, enhancing your perception and range. When you make a ranged Strike while in Arcane Cascade stance, you lower the DC of your flat check to target a creature that's [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) or [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) from you. The DC is reduced to 3 instead of 5 against a concealed creature and to 9 instead of 11 against a hidden one. When you cast [_shooting star_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1042) and target a hidden creature, you don't have to attempt the flat check for targeting a hidden creature with a ranged Strike.
name: Starlit Eyes
prerequisite: Arcane Cascade, starlit span hybrid study
